name: Demiurgosoft
body: Who Am I? ========= Hi!, I'm Andrés Ortiz, software developer and koalas fan. Currently finishing my Bachelor degree of Computer Science in Granada and working in an internship at the Oficina de Software Libre UGR. Make sure to check some of my projects on [GitHub](https://github.com/demiurgosoft) or my [Gists](https://gist.github.com/demiurgosoft). Also if you want to know more about what I've done please feel free to stalk me at [Linkedin](https://es.linkedin.com/in/andresortizcorrales) ## Cool Stuff I'm working on ### Maelström ![maelström logo](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/75/Maelstr%C3%B6m_Logo.png/100px-Maelstr%C3%B6m_Logo.png) _Maelström Logo under CC-by-sa license ()_ As my final dissertation for my BSc I'm developing a massively multiplayer online (MMO) strategy game with Node.js under AGPL v3 License. [Github](https://github.com/demiurgosoft/maelstrom) ### UGR Transparente The transparency portal of Granada University (UGR) (). Currently working on it's development at the Oficina de Software Libre. [Github](https://github.com/oslugr/ugr-transparente-servidor) ### Contact Me You can contact me by email , and feel free to follow me on twitter (@demiurgosoft)
